name: FitCalc: Fitness Calculator
short_desc: FitCalc is a free fitness app that helps users to optimize their body and health. Improved version of Fitness Calculator app.
desc:
Living a healthy way of life, prefer sport & fitness or just would like to know more about your health and body? In this case, this app is for you!

FitCalc is a second version of popular app - Fitness Calculator 1.0. It is a FREE offline fitness app that helps to optimize your body, health and nutrition.

PRO VERSION

name: FitCalc: Fitness Calculator PRO
short_desc: Pro ad-free version of FitCalc containing extra features like themes and daily reminders.
desc:
Living a healthy way of life, prefer sport & fitness or just would like to know more about your health and body? In this case, this app is for you!

FitCalc is a second version of popular app - Fitness Calculator 1.0. It is a FREE offline fitness app that helps to optimize your body, health and nutrition.

Special in Pro version:
✓ Ad free;
✓ Dark and light themes;
✓ Daily reminders for water intake, food intake and workouts;

name: Dim Block
short_desc: Dim Block is an open-source Android application that stops device screen from dimming with one click.
desc:
Dim Block is a simple application that stops your screen from dimming with one click. It is very easy to use and has a features for stop blocking dim on low battery and one-click opening of display settings.

The application really helps a lot while reading, watching images, photos or just while you showing something on your device for a few minutes. And it is totally free!

name: Fitness Calculator 1.0
short_desc: Android application that helps users in calculating optimal parameters for healthy life and good body shape, includes calorie counter, one rep-max and body fat calculator (150,000+ downloads).
desc:
Fitness Calculator is a free fitness app that helps you to optimize your body and health.

Application provides tips and forecasts about your weight to help you achieve a perfect healthy body.

DEPRECATION: This application is deprecated. Please download the new version of FitCalc app.
